name: @sentzunhat/zacatl
description: A modular, high-performance TypeScript microservice framework for Node.js, featuring layered architecture, dependency injection, and robust validation for building scalable APIs and distributed systems.
author: Zacatl Contributors

scripts.build:scripts:esm: npx tsc -p scripts/tsconfig.scripts.esm.json && chmod +x build/scripts/*.js || true
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:scripts:esm && npm run build:scripts:cjs
scripts.build:esm: npm run build:scripts:esm && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json && npx tsx scripts/fix-esm.ts
scripts.build:cjs: npm run build:scripts:cjs && npx tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npx tsc-alias -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.build: npm run clean:src && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run clean:src
scripts.test:coverage: NODE_ENV=test ENV=test bash -lc "npx vitest run --coverage --reporter json | tee test-results.json; exit ${PIPESTATUS[0]}" && npm run update:readme-coverage
scripts.type:check: npm run type:src:check && npm run type:test:check
scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:test && npm run lint:scripts
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:src:fix && npm run lint:test:fix && npm run lint:scripts:fix
scripts.lint:fix:silent: npm run lint:src:fix --quiet && npm run lint:test:fix --quiet && npm run lint:scripts:fix --quiet
scripts.clean:modules:examples: rm -rf examples/*/node_modules examples/*/*/node_modules examples/*/*/*/node_modules examples/*/*/*/*/node_modules 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf build build-cjs dist coverage publish *.tsbuildinfo *.log && npm run clean:builds -- --yes || true && npm run clean:src
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:examples && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:gitignored && npm run clean:modules:all
scripts.prepublish:only: npm run prepublish:guard && npm run clean:src && npm run test:coverage && npm run type:check && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.publish:dry:ci: npm run prepublish:guard && npm run clean:src && npm run test && npm run type:check && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run prepare-publish && npm publish ./publish --dry-run
scripts.publish:latest: npm run prepublish:only && npm run prepare-publish && npm publish ./publish --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish:otp: npm run prepublish:only && npm run prepare-publish && npm publish ./publish --access public --tag latest --otp
scripts.publish:dry: npm run prepublish:only && npm run prepare-publish && npm publish ./publish --dry-run
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p build/eslint && cp -R src/eslint/* build/eslint/ || true && mkdir -p build/localization/locales && cp -R src/localization/locales/* build/localization/locales/ || true
